first_para: Jessica Asato is a Labour politician. She was selected in 2012 as the parliamentary candidate in Norwich North for the 2015 General Election. She was one of 15 Labour candidates each given financial support of £10,000 by Lord Matthew Oakeshott the former Liberal Democrat in January 2015.

full.extract: Jessica Asato is a Labour politician. She was selected in 2012 as the parliamentary candidate in Norwich North for the 2015 General Election. She was one of 15 Labour candidates each given financial support of £10,000 by Lord Matthew Oakeshott the former Liberal Democrat in January 2015.
full.title: Jessica Asato
